Node.definition: = state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye
= female person who has a special and intimate relationship with another person
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= a bird with a blue gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else
= gauze like covering; ► worn over the face, usually by women; ≈ associated with beauty
= the fine thread like strands growing from the skin of humans and certain animals
= a large group of domesticated mammals that moves and stays together, either in an enclosure or in a open area ◄ usually sheep or goats, but can also include camels or cattle

= a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single flock (צֹאן) with sheep; ► raised for its milk, meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten

Node.gloss: to descend|to surge down|to stream down
Node.definition: exact meaning unsure; possibly: = action by which animals move down from an elevated place by skipping down from one place to another, ≈ which produces an elegant picture
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= a large group of domesticated mammals that moves and stays together, either in an enclosure or in a open area ◄ usually sheep or goats, but can also include camels or cattle

Node.gloss: to cut off from|to strip|to shear
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans remove from an object something that covers it, using a sharp tool

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= causative action by which humans wash an animal with water, ► in order to remove any dirt
= causative action by which someone gives birth to twins
= state in which humans or animals have lost one or more of their offspring

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= spun out filament, sometimes dyed scarlet; ◄ of cotton, flax, wool, or another material; ► used as strands for making ropes or for measuring the circumference of objects; ≈ regarded as weak and insignificant
poetic language: = the opening and cavity in the lower part of the face, surrounded by the lips, through which vocal sounds are emitted
= thin, broad piece of food cut from a larger portion

= a small tree reaching a height of 3 5 m, with narrow, dark green leaves and thorny branches; its has a red flower and produces red round fruits with a hard skin and tightly packed pockets of seeds inside; ◄ Punica granatum; ► the seeds can be made into wine; the flower shaped end of the fruit made it an attractive decoration on stone and in the temple; ≈ associated with love, beauty, and sex
= relation denoting that someone performs a certain event via the path of something else
= gauze like covering; ► worn over the face, usually by women; ≈ associated with beauty
= part of the body connecting the rump to the head; ► a ;place to wear ornaments, but also a yoke; ≈ a stiff neck is associated with insolence and pride
= relatively high structure made of stone; ► used for guarding the surrounding area and/or for providing protection against hostile forces from outside; ≈ associated with security and protection
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= one of the breasts of a woman or other female mammal
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= a young male fallow deer (אַיָּל) ≈ associated with beauty
= two children or young animals born at the same birth

= small to medium sized plain antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts, reddish brown in color with almost white underparts, and small horns (with exception of female impala); long legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; the female is sexually active at one year; high rate of reproduction; ◄ |iGazella dorcas|i* or |iGazella arabica|i*; ► clean and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with speed, grace, beauty, female sexuality, male virility, and fertility
= action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

= a flowering plant with an erect stem and long narrow leaves; it can grow to 1.5 m high; it has a bulbous root and cone shaped flowers, usually with 5 6 petals, which protrude straight out or slightly downward from the stem; ◄ Lilium candidum; ► associated with unsurpassed beauty
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= the gum of a bush or shrub with thick thorny branches that project and bend at odd angles; its leaves come in sets of three; its fruit is oval like a plum; its wood and bark have a pleasant smell; the gum oozes naturally from the branches; clear or yellowish brown when it comes out, but gets darker as it dries; ◄ Commiphora myrrha, abyssinica, or schimperi; ► an ingredient of anointing oil and perfume; ≈ regarded as precious
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye
= female person who has a special and intimate relationship with another person
= state in which humans or animals have a physical defect on their body

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
= woman who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
= action by which humans move from one place to another
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= mountain; ◄ located in Lebanon (לְבָנֹון)
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= mountain, also known as Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) Sion (שִׂיאֹון) and Sirion (שִׂרְיֹון) ◄ part of the Anti Lebanon range; located north east of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= mountain, also known as Senir (שְׂנִיר) Sion (שִׂיאֹון) and Sirion (שִׂרְיֹון) ◄ part of the Anti Lebanon range; located north east of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression and strength
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= one of the great cat family of about 2 m in length and of a yellowish brown color with black spots arranged in rosettes all over the body and the tail; ◄ Panthera pardus; ► hunts by stalking prey; ≈ symbol of violent danger
= causative process by which humans inspire feelings of affection in someone else
= friendly and endearing way to address a woman
= woman who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy
= causative process by which humans inspire feelings of affection in someone else
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= ornament worn around the neck of people and animals
= ornament ► worn around the neck

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= process in which a condition of becomes exceedingly pleasant
= a feeling of profound affection for another person, often accompanied by sexual desire
= friendly and endearing way to address a woman
= woman who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= a feeling of profound affection for another person, often accompanied by sexual desire

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

= generic terms for spices and aromatics, but sometimes specifically: fragrant resin ◄ produced by the balsam tree; ► used as ingredient for anointing oil and fragrant incense, and as perfume; ≈ considered very valuable
= virgin honey (דְּבַשׁ) dripping straight from the honeycomb; ≈ regarded as very desirable food of high quality
= woman who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy
= sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility

= white fluid; ◄ secreted by women and female mammals; ► for nourishment of their children or young; also used as food for humans; ≈ highly appreciated and considered high quality food; associated with delight, whiteness, purity, wealth, and well being; metaphor for beauty, young age; quality, wealth, and sex
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
= a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it

= a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping
= a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance
= action by which humans secure a door or a lid so that it cannot be opened, ► usually to restrict access to a room or a space
= friendly and endearing way to address a woman
= woman who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy
= a place where water wells up from an underground source
= action by which humans secure a door or a lid so that it cannot be opened, ► usually to restrict access to a room or a space
= an opening in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it; ≈ its water is regarded as a source of blessing
literally: to put a seal on an object; hence: = causative action by which an opening or entrance is closed so that nothing can enter or leave, ◄ as if kept from being opened with a seal
meaning unsure; possibly: = branch of a tree, here extended to denote the body of a young woman and all it offers in lovemaking
= location for growing trees

= a small tree reaching a height of 3 5 m, with narrow, dark green leaves and thorny branches; its has a red flower and produces red round fruits with a hard skin and tightly packed pockets of seeds inside; ◄ Punica granatum; ► the seeds can be made into wine; the flower shaped end of the fruit made it an attractive decoration on stone and in the temple; ≈ associated with love, beauty, and sex
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants
= object of an extraordinary good quality

= a shrub that reaches 2 3 meters in height, with opposite leaves and many fragrant white flowers; ► its leaves yield a red juice that people in many countries use for coloring the skin and hair; ≈ associated with fragrance and beauty

= a leafy bush, less than a meter high, with fragrant smelling, short stems and a tuft of three narrow leaflets at the tip of each stem; its pink flowers are umbrella shaped; ► its tubers are pounded to extract a pungent, pale orange or yellow oil; ≈ associated with fragrance

= a leafy bush, less than a meter high, with fragrant smelling, short stems and a tuft of three narrow leaflets at the tip of each stem; its pink flowers are umbrella shaped; ► its tubers are pounded to extract a pungent, pale orange or yellow oil; ≈ associated with fragrance

= a plant with tapered grasslike leaves growing from an onion like bulb under the ground; it has a reddish or purple flower; ◄ Crocus sativus; ► its flower is used for perfume and medicine; ≈ associated with fragrance

meaning unsure; either: (1) = type of grass that grows in clumps to more than a meter high and has stiff leaves like sword grass and has a sweet smell; ◄ Cymbopogon; ► oil is extracted by boiling and distilling the leaves; used in the oil for anointing priests; or (2) = a type of reed with stiff leaves, distinguished by its green flower head that grows on a stalk to about 50 cm high; ◄ Acorus calamus or Calamus; ► the scented leaves and more strongly scented tubers have traditionally been used medicinally and to make fragrances, and the dried and powdered tubers have been used as a substitute for ginger, cinnamon and nutmeg
= fragrant substance, ◄ made from the inner bark of the cinnamon tree ► and used for the preparation of perfume and anointing oil
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

= the gum of a bush or shrub with thick thorny branches that project and bend at odd angles; its leaves come in sets of three; its fruit is oval like a plum; its wood and bark have a pleasant smell; the gum oozes naturally from the branches; clear or yellowish brown when it comes out, but gets darker as it dries; ◄ Commiphora myrrha, abyssinica, or schimperi; ► an ingredient of anointing oil and perfume; ≈ regarded as precious
= large tree which may reach a height of 36 m.; native to south east Asia and northern India; ◄ Aquilaria ahallocha (agarwood); ► known for its fragrant wood; ≈ associated with fragrance and beauty
= literally: head; hence: = state in which products have a quality that is superior to anything else

= generic terms for spices and aromatics, but sometimes specifically: fragrant resin ◄ produced by the balsam tree; ► used as ingredient for anointing oil and fragrant incense, and as perfume; ≈ considered very valuable
= an opening in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it; ≈ its water is regarded as a source of blessing
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance

= hole in the ground that reaches underground water; ◄ usually manmade, dug out of the ground, or hewn from rock, but may also be naturally occurring; ► used for accessing, collecting and storing water; used by shepherds as a source of water for their animals; ≈ regarded as a source of life because of its water; sometimes used as a metaphor for a woman, possibly based on the physical resemblance of the well to the vagina and its connotation as a source of life
= state in which objects have recently attained a particular state
= range of mountains; ◄ north of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► known for the cedar (אֶרֶז) and other trees growing there
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
= a wind coming from the north
= wind, ◄ emanating from the south
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance

= generic terms for spices and aromatics, but sometimes specifically: fragrant resin ◄ produced by the balsam tree; ► used as ingredient for anointing oil and fragrant incense, and as perfume; ≈ considered very valuable
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants
= object of an extraordinary good quality
